description:
A Big Data Administrator is none less than a monarch in the world of data analytics, because of which a certification in this course is going to fetch anyone the best of its kind offers in the data analytics industry. You can be that ruler if you are willing to upgrade your data analytics skills. This course on Big Data and Hadoop Administrator will help you procure vast and indepth knowledge on the concepts related to Big Data and Hadoop administrator.

Content and Overview

We provide practical sessions on a number of tools, YARN, Impala, Hive, Sqoop and Pig to name a few.

Big Data Analytics is considered as a great way to combine and analyze data, making it a fast moving product in the analytics industry. It is not surprising how the need for Analytics has increased the career graph of the certified Big Data Hadoop Administrator professionals. As a matter of fact, a Hadoop administrator is fortified with all the necessary expertise to uphold the data processing network.

There are 125 lectures with demos, chapter end quizzes and 9 lab exercises, making your learning experience nothing less than a hands-on one.

This course mainly focuses on Big Data and Hadoop ecosystem providing a thorough and in depth understanding of data storage giving an overview of commercial distributions along with other Hadoop ecosystem components. You can take a glance at various concepts and components of Big Data and Hadoop from ecosystem to clustering. By the time you finish this course, you will be having complete understanding on configuring cluster. Not to forget the operation systems Map reduce and YARN which will also be part of this course.

A Hadoop professional is different in the Analytics industry by:

  • Using adaptable frameworks like Apache Hadoop for leading the move from the traditional database.
  • Endowing with Hadoop.
  • Formulating the Big Data methodology drive from Hadoop execution through exceptional security at huge scale and speed.

Making you an expert is what we are looking forward to through our content.

What are you going to get from this course?

    ·Over 125 lectures and demos, and lab exercises!

    ·Learn Big Data and Hadoop administrator from a professional trainer at your own desk.

    ·20 hours of teaching you object-oriented programming, classes, objects, loops, and much more.

    ·Visual training method, offering users increased retention and accelerated learning.

    ·Breaks even the most complex applications down into simplistic steps.

    ·Accelerated learning with the help of demos and lab exercises.
title: Master Big Data and Hadoop Administration
